short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created by Ninio and is used to get anime titles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension uses Kitsu.io api. 
You can use this extension to get the japanese title of an anime by searching with the english title, or vice versa.
